name: Tempress Systems
overview: Tempress Systems, Inc. develops and manufactures horizontal and vertical diffusion/atmospheric and low pressure chemical vapor deposition furnace systems. It offers horizontal production furnaces, small batch vertical furnaces, research and development furnaces, reactive ion etch systems, plasma etch and deposition systems, retrofits, spareparts, furnace and furnace components, advanced single wafer plasma process systems, gassource cabinets, loadstations, boatloaders, system controllers, conveyor furnaces, and Pyrox reactor systems, as well as training services. The company serves photo voltaics, semiconductors, photonics, MEMS, nanotechnology, and hybrids industries. Tempress Systems, Inc. was formerly known as Tempress B.V. and changed its name to Tempress Systems, Inc. in 1994. The company was founded in 1967 and is based in Vaassen, the Netherlands with additional operations in France. Tempress Systems, Inc. operates as a subsidiary of Amtech Systems, Inc.
